title: Dance Traxx, Vol. 2 (1987)
description:
What kind of dance music were you listening to in 1987?  Well, all of these made it BIG in that time... enough to put them on a major record label and release on a CD!

I bought this when it came out on CD, but was available on vinyl in 1987.

I highly recommend #4 - Can&#039;t Live Without Your Love by Suzy.  Great driving high energy sound with a sing-a-long melody.  



Tracklisting:

1. I Can&#039;t Wait - Nu Shooz 	
2. Baby Love - Regina 	
3. Two Of Hearts - Stacey Q 	
4. Can&#039;t Live Without Your Love - Suzy 	
5. Point Of No Return - Nu Shooz 	
6. For Tonight - Nancy Martinez 		
7. Showing Out (Get Fresh At The Weekend) - Mel & Kim 		
8. Diamond Girl - Nice And Wild 		
9. We Connect - Stacey Q
